title: Meowkai skin sale?

embed.description: Check out all the champs and skins on sale this September! Like previous sales schedules, we're not posting the exact dates for each champ and skin, but they'll all be on sale sometime next month.

body:
Hi! So, Just wondering, does anyone know exactly when Meowkai goes on sale? My girlfriend's birthday is the 27th and she wants that skin more than anything. I'd really appreciate the help!

_Sorry if I posted this in the wrong board_

replies.body: Unfortunately, I don't have any specific dates for sales beyond what's provided in that sale schedules.  Bookmark the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page which will show which skins go on sale for the week.  Hopefully, everything will work out in time for your girlfriend's birthday!  Fingers crossed!

There's currently no exact date for this. However, the early skin sales tend to start towards the middle-end of the month, like around the 21st of the month, and will last for 4 days.

Hope this helps.
Thanks man, I appreciate it a ton!
